titleInfo.title: ‘Skeleton plan of a survey of the eastern portion of the peninsula of Aden’

physicalDescription.extent: Materials:Pen and ink with wash on paperDimensions:1311 x 2500 mm

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:Lettered and numbered for reference to correspond to symbols present on series of sections produced together with the plan and shown by pecked lines.Series of sections held at IOR/X/3228/1-4, IOR/X/3229/1-5, IOR/X/3230/1-6, IOR/X/3231 and IOR/X/3232.Inscriptions:On recto in the lower centre:‘C.W. GrantLt. Coll. EngineerWm. JacobMajor Artillery’‘Special Committee On the Aden Defences’‘Bombay April 23rd 1844’.
